page.title: 05CHILLENDEN MILL
page.content: The mill is not in working order. The grindstones are still there. One is of Sandstone and the other is of French Burstone. The mill is owned and looked after by the Kent County Council, Property Services Department. There is a group called Friends of the Mill. It was started in March 1985. Michael Adams of Kent County Council Property Services Department wanted someone to run the mill. Some people in the village do no like the group. Their oppinion is that the mill should be left alone. There is a rota of the friends who open it on Sundays from April to September. The Friends of the Mill raise money to help the council to keep the mill in good repair.
